**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-19T18:38:43Z" title="07/19/2016 06:38  PM" data-short="7 yr">July 19, 2016</time> by Redneck**

Hey Redneck i got a pretty cool modded XR-2 replica ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

want to see it 

msg me

> 
> 
> On 7/2/2016 at 9:58 PM, JollyGreenGI said:
> 
> 
> Yessssss
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I've gone through so many Frankenstein attempts to bring the Raven into KSP  
> [![1ihUbUg.png](http://i.imgur.com/1ihUbUg.png)](http://i.imgur.com/1ihUbUg.png "Enlarge image")
> 
> 
> 
> 
> That is tremendously awesome man, keep it up!
> 

Can you post a .craft file?

yep im still here. no new news to report. I havent worked on it. But she is not forgotten. I am still working with her in blender yesterday as a matter of fact. But not for KSP but for cough ARMA3 cough. It will be <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr>. Scrams will be replaced with a internal weapons bay. And rocket engines with jet engines. A high altitude bomber. Some would say why put it in arma? I say simply "because I want to". And if and when squad ever gets done with this dev cycle I will work on her for KSP. The model is pretty much chopped up and ready for unity. I know you guys may not care about ARMA but im just being honest where I am at with it at the moment

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-01T19:49:41Z" title="05/01/2017 07:49  PM" data-short="7 yr">May 1, 2017</time> by Redneck**

> 
> 
> On 5/1/2017 at 2:23 PM, MaverickSawyer said:
> 
> 
> Can you post a .craft file?
> 

Yup, here you are: [https://kerbalx.com/JollyGreenGI/XR-2-RVNSTR-MK2-OPT](https://kerbalx.com/JollyGreenGI/XR-2-RVNSTR-MK2-OPT)

It's not stock, uses [OPT](https://spacedock.info/mod/1028/OPT%20Space%20Plane), [B.Dynamics](https://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/223741-bdynamics) and [Instell Inc scramjets](https://spacedock.info/mod/152/Instell%20Incorporated%20Experimental%20Technologies.).

Yeah so this project is now dead for now. I may finish it at some point. But I have pretty much left KSP and the community for other projects. I think KSP is gasping its last breaths for development. Good luck KSP and whatever markets you are reaching out to. Im out
What is your progress on the XR2 and the G42-200 Starliner?I will really like if you release the alpha for both!
